attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Represents the value of the search input box. Can be set to a default value, and will reflect the value provided by the user when interactive with the control

properties.name: value
properties.description: Represents the value of the search input box. Can be set to a default value, and will reflect the value provided by the user when interactive with the control

events.name: search
events.description: On search provides details of input value and search type

slots.description: Unnamed slot, can slot in a dropdown either with `<zui-select>` or a `<select>`

cssProperties.name: --zui-search-submit-hover-background-color
cssProperties.description: Background hover color on submit button

cssProperties.name: --zui-search-submit-color
cssProperties.description: Change the color of search icon

cssProperties.name: --zui-search-submit-hover-color
cssProperties.description: Change the hover color of search icon

cssProperties.name: --zui-search-border-color
cssProperties.description: Border color on slotted select element
